products.name: Madhuharani Diabetic Relief Drink
products.bestFor: Diabetes is a disease caused as a result of the increment of blood glucose level due to the metabolic irregularities of the human body This product is made as of trusted traditional recipe which has been blended using the latest technological advancement to control diabetic and, Reduce frequent urination Eliminate excess thirst Weight loss Lethargic behaviours Tingling or numbness in the hands or feet Constipation  For a controlled diabetic level with minimum side effects
products.suggestedUse: Let a small packet  rest in  half a cup of boiling water and consume twice daily for better results
